ShiftStatus.name: ShiftStatus
ShiftStatus.description: Represents a shift, such as Tentative, Published, or Confirmed.

ApiName.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an ID or master label.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether this is the default shift status value (true) or not (false) in the picklist. Only one value can be the default value.

MasterLabel.description: Master label for this shift status value. This display value is the internal label that does not get translated. Limit: 255 characters.

SortOrder.description: Number used to sort this value in the shift status picklist. These numbers are not guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous shift status values might have been deleted.

StatusCode.description: Describes the status of the shift using static values. Possible values are: Tentative Published Confirmed
